name: KillRoom [LD37]
description:
KillRoom

For Ludum Dare 37 (One Room) I made another endless game. This time it's about avoiding traps in one deadly room. How long will you survive? Post your times!

Controls:
Use arrows or WASD to walk.
Press C to show Credits.
Press ESC to exit the game.
When you die, press R to restart.

Software used:
GameMaker: Studio Pro
GIMP
BeepBox.co
SFXR

I wanted to make more patterns and floor-traps, but I'm just too tired, even to balance existing patterns. Also, timing of breaks between traps is completely broken. I know why, but I don't know where is the line that causes all this mess. I'll try to fix it again in the future.

Still, I like the final result. Enjoy!
